Description: Web security involves protective measures taken by developers to safeguard web applications from various threats that could harm the business or its users.
Learn why HTTPS is crucial for web security and data protection.
Visit the Wikipedia page for the Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) to understand its role in web security.

Topic: OWASP Web Application Security Testing Checklist
Description: Explore the OWASP Web Application Security Testing Checklist, a valuable resource for assessing web application security.
Familiarize yourself with the OWASP Top 10 Security Risks, a list of the most critical web application security threats.
Access OWASP Cheatsheets, which provide practical guidance on various web security topics.
Learn about Content Security Policy (CSP) and how it helps prevent common web security issues.
Watch a step-by-step tutorial series on OWASP ZAP, a popular security testing tool, to enhance your web security skills.
